about_the_game:
Solar Sweets is a free-to-play online multiplayer kitchen-simulator game where you can compete with up to 4 friends to find how who is the better chef! Create 10+ different types of pastries including: Waffles, Croissants, Pancakes and more!

Sweet Sweet Gameplay
Come aboard the Solar Sweets airship and take customers' orders. In the kitchen, you'll utilize chopping boards, waffle irons, and ovens in various mini-games to craft the perfect sweet treat for the customer. Complete orders quickly to gain higher scores, however be careful to not ruin the food. If you do ruin the food, feel free to throw it... at other players to slow them down! All is fair in Solar Sweets.

Simple but Chaotic Time
Our game is simple to play for anyone to pick up and free to play so friends can play together without the need to pay any fee. Gather your friends or join public lobbies to prove your baking prowess.

name: Solar Sweets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: dual core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel hd 520
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
